meico.app.gui

Class ImageData

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.app.gui.ImageData

  • class ImageData
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a wrapper around image datatype, only for the purpose of integration with the meico GUI, i.e. its visualization as a data object.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
